Source Settings Wallpaper Settings Effect Settings Effect Parameters Interval Settings Download Settings Account Settings Notification Settings Application Settings Transition Settings Animation Settings Gesture Settings About Application Used Libraries
Show Preview Load image preview into source list Time Active
Preserve Context Hold image texture in RAM to prevent reloading on return Fill Images Fill screen with image Shuffle Images Shuffle images Scale Images Rescale images if lower/higher resolution Show Album Art Change background to album art when playing music (EXPERIMENTAL) Update Interval Change image after certain period Force Interval Force change on interval Reset On Cycle Reset timer on manual cycle Change on Return New image on return Change When Locked Change image even if phone is locked, does not wake device
Transition Speed Amount of time for transition Fade Fade between images Horizontal Overshoot Horizontal fling transition Reverse Horizontal Overshoot Reverse horizontal overshoot direction Horizontal Overshoot Intensity Amount of horizontal overshoot Vertical Overshoot Vertical fling transition Reverse Vertical Overshoot Reverse vertical overshoot direction Vertical Overshoot Intensity Amount of vertical overshoot Zoom In Zoom in new image Zoom Out Zoom out old image Spin In Rotate new image in Reverse Spin In Spin in counter-clockwise Spin In Angle Rotation angle for spin in Spin Out Rotate old image out Reverse Spin Out Spin out counter-clockwise Spin Out Angle Rotation angle for spin out
Use Horizontal Animation Pan side to side animation Use Vertical Animation Pan up and down animation Horizontal Speed Horizontal animation speed Vertical Speed Vertical animation speed pixels per frame> Scale Speed Adjust animation speed for zoom feature Frame Rate Rate of rendering Frames per second Animation Safety Side buffer for animation in pixels
Double Tap Gesture Change on double tap Use Scrolling Enable wallpaper scrolling with homescreen Exact Scrolling Force 1:1 wallpaper scrolling Parallax Scrolling Reverse direction of wallpaper scrolling Use Drag Drag with 2 fingers to move image around Reverse Drag Reverse direction of image movement Use Zoom Pinch to scale from bottom left corner, recommended to also enable drag, alters scaling of image to provide full resolution Extend Zoom Extend scale to zoom image out completely Use Long Press Reset Long press wallpaper to reset image position
Add New Source Source Title Data # of images Sort Sources Download Images Cycle Wallpaper
OK Cancel Yes No Save Default Use Directory Reset Directory Clear History
Image Width Minimum width of image Image Height Minimum height of image Full resolution Download full resolution images Download Timer Download interval Start Time Time to begin download timer Reset On Download Reset timer on manual download Use WiFi Allow download on WiFi Use Mobile Data Allow download on mobile Reattempt Download Will retry download on connection obtained if timer is missed Download Notification Notify on download completed High Quality Download high quality images Force Images Attempt to force download Custom Download Path Set folder for downloaded images Image History Save history of downloaded images Image History Size Max history entries to store Cache Thumbnails Store thumbnails for history Thumbnail Size Max side length of thumbnail image in pixels Keep Images Keep all images in cache Delete Old Remove old images on download Prevent Duplicates Check URLs to prevent redundant downloads, requires image history enabled Delete Images Purge downloaded images Image Prefix Prefix for file name Experimental Downloader Include JavaScript generated websites
Google Account Connect a Google account
Use Effects Use image effects Manual Frequency Chance of applying manual effects Random Frequency Chance of applying random effects Manual Override Force apply manual effects over random effects Random Effects Apply random effects Dual Tone Gray High contrast dual tone Toast Effects Display applied effect in message Reset Effects Reset to default values
Color 1 Color 2
Auto Fix Auto Fix Image Brightness Brightness of image Contrast Contrast of image Cross Process Effect Cross process effect Documentary Effect Black and white effect Dual Tone Show image with two color tones Fill Light Effect Contrast of image Fisheye Effect Fisheye effect Grain Effect Grain effect Grayscale Effect Grayscale effect Lomoish Effect Lomoish effect Negative Effect Invert image colors Posterize Effect Image posterization effect Saturation Satruation of image Sepia Effect Sepia tone effect Sharpen Effect Sharpen image Temperature Color temperature of image Vignette Effect Vignette effect
Use Toasts Notify user of info on screen Force Multi-Pane Use a dual pane layout Right Drawer Place navigation drawer on right side Change Theme Use different app theme Advanced Settings Show advanced settings Reset Settings Set default settings Reshow Source List Tutorial Click to reshow source tutorial
How to Customize Simply click one of the parts of the notification above to view that part\'s settings Use Notification Show a persistent notification, some options require Android 4.1+ Notification Game Show a matching game in notification Fill Image Fill notification icon with image Icon Action Custom action on icon click Show Pin Indicator Show a pin overlay in the notification when image is pinned Previous History Size Number of images to store in previous buffer Force high resolution icon Loads higher resolution icon, not recommended as this will cause lag Reshow Notification Tutorial Click to reshow notification tutorial screen
Used Libraries The following libraries were used in the creation of this application. Click on their entries to check them out. Jsoup Library Used to download and parse html.\nCopyright © 2009 – 2013 Jonathan Hedley (jonathan@hedley.net) ShowcaseView Library Used to create the fancy tutorials.\nCopyright Alex Curran (+Alex) © 2012. All rights reserved. Picasso Library Used to efficiently load some of the images.\nCopyright 2013 Square, Inc. ColorPickerView Library Used to provide color options.\nCopyright © 2010 Daniel Nilsson
Copyright © 2014 Winson Chiu Copyright © 2014 Winson Chiu
